item.title: Madigas demand representation in committee on internal reservation in Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Madiga community has urged Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah to include its leader Hemaraj Askihal in the committee headed by a retired High Court judge for collecting empirical data on internal reservation.
Holding a protest in Raichur on November 25, community leaders demanded that the committee headed by the judge include leaders of all communities of Scheduled Castes, including Mr Askihal from the Madiga community. Only then would members of Scheduled Castes accept the report submit...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: 7 Hidden Historical Places To Discovered In Raichur
Raichur: Man Murdered Over Firecracker Dispute During Deepavali Celebrations
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: A violent confrontation erupted in Ragimanagudda Layout late Thursday when two groups clashed over fireworks being set off near a residence, leading to the killing of Narasimhalu, 37. The incident occurred during Deepavali festivities when several youths were bursting firecrackers in front of Narasimhalu 's residence. Objecting to this activity escalated into a violent confrontation between the two parties, resulting in Narasimhalu's death and severe injuries to two others. Raichur West...]]>
item.author: Tnn
